features: New Unlocker App: Hermit Premium can now be purchased via a separate Unlocker App: https://hermit.chimbori.com/unlocker

Recently, we heard a few complaints from users who were unable to purchase Hermit through the in-app purchase. After investigating, we found these linked to a bug in Google Play. Since we have no other way to fix this, we quickly created a separate Unlocker App so you can continue to enjoy Hermit.
More updates coming soon. This release is a quick fix that only adds support for Unlocker.
See the full list at https://hermit.chimbori.com/changes
